Metrics¶

Hopkins Test¶

Assess the clusterability of a dataset.

param X

The input dataset

type X

numpy array, DataFrame

param sampling_size

The sampling size which is used to evaluate the number of DataFrame.

type sampling_size

int

returns

hopkins score – The hopkins score of the dataset (between 0 and 1)

rtype

float or raise errors
